mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chattingroom ORDER BY identity DESC
SELECT * FROM chattingroom WHERE seller = #{seller} ORDER BY identity DESC

SELECT room.identity roomId, room.board, room.seller, room.buyer, board.title title, user.identity userId, user.nickname, user.imgPath FROM chattingroom room, user user, board_trade board WHERE (seller = #{userId} or buyer = #{userId}) AND (room.buyer = user.identity or room.seller = user.identity) AND (room.board = board.identity)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM chattingroom WHERE board = #{board} AND seller = #{seller}
